name: part_007
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ生誕祭2024】ｰ COLORFUL ｰ【3DLIVE】 [C-QdqYjdArM]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa and Amane Kanata concluding their MC section as Kanata leaves the stage.
Cinematic transition with light effects and crowd shots.
Performance of 'Eternal Silver' (永遠の銀) by Tokoyami Towa and Ookami Mio.

subtitles.original: （笑い声）
subtitles.english: (Laughing)

subtitles.original: 違ったんだ。
subtitles.english: That wasn't it.

subtitles.original: 間違えましたー。
subtitles.english: I made a mistake!

subtitles.original: バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Bye-bye!

subtitles.original: 永遠の銀
subtitles.english: Eternal Silver

subtitles.original: 作詞・作曲：kemu (kemu vox)
subtitles.english: Lyrics & Composition: kemu (kemu vox)

subtitles.original: 残された呼吸を使い果たせば
subtitles.english: If I use up my remaining breath

subtitles.original: 抱きしめた記憶さえ灰へと散る
subtitles.english: Even the memories I held close will scatter into ash

subtitles.original: 鼓動と呪いだ、と気付きながら
subtitles.english: While realizing it's a heartbeat and a curse

subtitles.original: 鮮烈な嘲笑、映らない棺
subtitles.english: A vivid sneer, a coffin that doesn't reflect

subtitles.original: その叫びを待って過去に溶ける
subtitles.english: Waiting for that cry, it melts into the past

subtitles.original: 暗室の花だけを道連れに
subtitles.english: Taking only the flowers from the darkroom with me

subtitles.original: 嫌だよ、終わるために生まれた秘境など
subtitles.english: I hate it, a secret region born only to end

subtitles.original: 息を止めて、そのままで、命よ銀に枯れ
subtitles.english: Hold your breath, just as you are, let life wither into silver

subtitles.original: 果てなき夢がいつまでも続きますように
subtitles.english: May the endless dream continue forever

subtitles.original: 消えたくないよ、消えないで、ただそれだけを祈った
subtitles.english: I don't want to disappear, don't disappear, I prayed for just that

subtitles.original: 最後、最後の幸せ
subtitles.english: The last, the last happiness

subtitles.original: 誰にも、誰にも奪わせない
subtitles.english: I won't let anyone, anyone take it away

subtitles.original: 離さない
subtitles.english: I won't let go

subtitles.original: 作られた世界はどちらだろうか
subtitles.english: Which one is the created world?

subtitles.original: 目を逸らし死神に問われたのは
subtitles.english: Turning my eyes away, what the reaper asked me was...

subtitles.original: 濡れる陽の鮮やかさを手に囃す頃
subtitles.english: When praising the vividness of the wetting sun in my hands

subtitles.original: 白楼は泣き続ける、その結末を思い出せ
subtitles.english: Hakurou keeps crying, remember that ending

subtitles.original: 朝を迎えるのはあと何日だろう
subtitles.english: How many days left until morning?

subtitles.original: 残された時間はあと何秒だろう
subtitles.english: How many seconds left of the time?

subtitles.original: この心が満たされるのはあと何秒だろう
subtitles.english: How many more seconds until this heart is satisfied?

subtitles.original: 何秒だろう
subtitles.english: How many more seconds?

subtitles.original: 願いよ届かずに、朽ちていく砂時計
subtitles.english: May the wish go unheard, the hourglass rotting away

subtitles.original: 息を止めて、そのままで、命よ銀に枯れ
subtitles.english: Hold your breath, just as you are, let life wither into silver

subtitles.original: 優しい歌がいつまでも響きますように
subtitles.english: May the gentle song echo forever

subtitles.original: 悲しみもいつか去るのなら、いつかまで送りかえそう
subtitles.english: If sadness will also leave someday, let's send it back until then

subtitles.original: こんなに、こんなに、ささやかだ
subtitles.english: It's so, so modest

subtitles.original: 最後、最後の願い事
subtitles.english: The last, the last wish

subtitles.original: いつか奏でる日々だけが続けばよかった
subtitles.english: I wish only the days played someday would continue

subtitles.original: それを守るだけの力が在ればよかった
subtitles.english: I wish I had the strength just to protect that

subtitles.original: 澄んだ夕風をずっと見ていたかった
subtitles.english: I wanted to keep looking at the clear evening breeze

subtitles.original: それを守るだけの力が在ればよかった
subtitles.english: I wish I had the strength just to protect that

subtitles.original: いつか奏でる日々だけが続けばよかった
subtitles.english: I wish only the days played someday would continue

subtitles.original: それを守るだけの力が在ればよかった
subtitles.english: I wish I had the strength just to protect that

subtitles.original: 澄んだ夕風をずっと見ていたかった
subtitles.english: I wanted to keep looking at the clear evening breeze

subtitles.original: それを守るだけの力が在ればよかった
subtitles.english: I wish I had the strength just to protect that

subtitles.original: いつか奏でる日々だけが続けばよかった
subtitles.english: I wish only the days played someday would continue

subtitles.original: それを守るだけの力が在ればよかった
subtitles.english: I wish I had the strength just to protect that

subtitles.original: 全てを捧げても
subtitles.english: Even if I sacrifice everything

subtitles.original: 息を止めて、そのままで、命よ銀に枯れ
subtitles.english: Hold your breath, just as you are, let life wither into silver

subtitles.original: 果てなき夢がいつまでも続きますように
subtitles.english: May the endless dream continue forever

subtitles.original: 消えたくないよ、消えないで、ただそれだけを祈った
subtitles.english: I don't want to disappear, don't disappear, I prayed for just that

subtitles.original: 最後、最後の幸せ
subtitles.english: The last, the last happiness

subtitles.original: それでも、それでも、触れるなら
subtitles.english: Still, still, if I touch...

subtitles.original: 許さない
subtitles.english: I won't forgive
